EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Carl, Thanks so much for getting back to me. I am so sorry to hear you are not feeling well, winter illnesses are spreading like wild fire around here as well. When you are ready you may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Carl [mailto:letocj@netscape.net] Sent: Thursday, January 03, 2013 7:44 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Carl, Nicole Lawson Thought You May Be Interested In MBO Partners Hello Sara, I have been under the weather since returning from my trip. Yes, I would like to get some more information. I started to take a look at the web site before I left but it was just for a brief moment. Thanks for following up.
Carl -----Original Message----- From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: letocj <letocj@netscape.net <mailto:letocj@netscape.net>> Sent: Thu, Jan 3, 2013 5:39 pm Subject: RE: Carl, Nicole Lawson Thought You May Be Interested In MBO PartnersHi Carl, Hope you are doing well. As a courtesy, I wanted to follow up on my email below. Are you still interested in learning more about MBO Partners? Please let me know when you have a moment. Thank you,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>] Sent: Thursday, December 27, 2012 7:26 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Carl, Nicole Lawson Thought You May Be Interested In MBO Partners To view this email as a web page, click hereDear Carl,Ive been using MBO for some time and thought you might be interested in their services too. Check them out when you get a second. Nicole LawsonNicole Lawson has been utilizing the business services of MBO Partners, and thinks you could benefit from the program as well. My name is Sara Conde, a Consultant Services Advisor, and if you have a few minutes, I invite you to learn what MBO Partners is all about and decide for yourself.1) Who do we work with? We work with independent consultants who have an established clientele, as well as those considering venturing out to launch a new consulting business.2) Whats our mission?Its pretty simple  we make it easy for independent consultants and their clients to work together by handling the administrative, financial, legal, tax and expense burdens that bog down consultants, thus increasing their billable time. In addition, we provide them access to the largest exclusive online community of successful independent consultants, the clients that engage with them, and a multitude of valuable resources.3) What solutions do we provide? Click here to learn more about how we help independent consultants.Was Nicole Lawson right about MBO Partners being a good fit for you? If so, Id love to be your resource for any of your independent consulting-related goals, and can help:· Explain our services in more detail, and more specifically how we can help you· Prepare customized bill rate and cash flow estimates to help you get the most out of your business· Provide you access to a multitude of resources catered to independent consultants and their needsPlease feel free to schedule a time that is convenient for you to speak with me, so I can learn more about you, describe our program in more detail, and answer any questions you may have.I look forward to chatting with you. ___________________________________ Sara Conde Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
